article.headline: UTEP 96, Rice 67
article.story: EL PASO, Texas (AP) -- Omar Thomas scored 26 points to lead Texas-El Paso to a 96-67 victory over Rice on Thursday night. Thomas hit 11-of-14 from the field, including his only 3-point attempt and 3-of-4 free throws. He also had four assists and two steals. Miguel Ayala came off the bench to score 20 points, 18 of those on 3-pointers for UTEP. UTEP (12-2, 2-0 WAC) capitalized on 17 Rice turnovers, scoring 24 points. Lorenzo Williams led Rice (7-4, 2-1) with 13 points and Jamaal Moore added 12. UTEP led 48-38 at the half.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
